Title: Relates to imposing points on a driver's license for illegally parking in a handicapped parking space
Summary: Imposes points on a driver's license for illegally parking in a handicapped parking space.
LawCode: Amd ยง1203-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to imposing points on a person's license for illegally parking in a handicapped parking space
